Text.Page:
Isren created the fey races. But did you know centaur wardens and pranksome redcaps were duty bound to guard and tend her garden?

The goddess's power must be waning, because now they're wandering Seeliewood instead of doing their duty in the garden.

Bring me the bands that Isren used to bind them to their duty. Perhaps I can strengthen the magic in them.

This magic is still strong.

They wouldn't have left voluntarily while bonded to their duty.

Something must have driven them out.
Bribe them; fight them! Just get them to relinquish the bands.
